alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 2:00AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Harding County, Perkins County and Ziebach County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reduced visibility due to blowing snow could make travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
